content: blue blanket by eva kuehlmann 2013 small baby blanket - a garter rib rectangle with a cable pattern along both long sides all framed with a seed stitch border - after the pattern is established the main pattern is based on 2 row repeat with the cables crossing every so often easy to memorize details abbreviations size - 55cm 22in x 75cm 29 5in after blocking c4b - move 2sts on cable needle & hold in back k2 k2 from needle - 3 25mm us3 & cable needle cable needle gauge - 25sts = 10cm 4in over stocking stitch c4f - move 2sts on cable needle & hold in front k2 k2 from yarnweight - sport 5ply cable needle yardage - 650-700m 710-760yards k - knit shown in - debbie bliss baby cashmerino k1b - knit 1 in stitch below m - marker p - purl repeat - reapeat let s knit cast on 133 stitches bottom border row 1-7 *k1 p1* repeat *-* to last stitch k1 place markers after stitch 5 20 113 & 128 body the main pattern is based on a 10 row repeat basically - knit 5sts seed stitch 15sts cable pattern 93sts garter rib 15sts cable pattern and 5sts seed stitch the cable pattern is underlined in dots right side - r ow 1 3 5 7 *k1 p1* repeat *-* once more k1 k1b p2 k4 p1 k4 p2 k1b k to m k1b p2 k4 p1 k4 p2 k1b *k1 p1* repeat *-* once more k1 right side - row 9 cablecrossing *k1 p1* repeat *-* once more k1 k1b p2 c4f p1 c4b p2 k1b k to m k1b p2 c4f p1 c4b p2 k1b *k1 p1* repeat *-* once more k1 all wrong side row - row 2 4 6 8 10 *k1 p1* repeat *-* k1 p1 k2 p4 k1 p4 k2 p1 *k3 p3* repeat *-* another 14 times k3 p1 k2 p4 k1 p4 k2 p1 *k1 p1* repeat *-* k1 repeat all 10 row 28times in total or to desired length knit row 1-8 once more before adding the border top border row 1-6 *k1 p1* repeat to last stitch k1 bind off sew in ends and block lightly copyright 2013 © eva kuehlmann - pattern is for personal use only do not reproduce sell or otherwise publish this pattern without permission of the copyright owner londonleo@web de - www londonleo blogspot com schematic & chart chart for body does not include top & bottom seed stitch border happy knitting copyright 2013 © eva kuehlmann -
